Articles.Content:
Hi everyone!

I'm KaijuFace. I've got somewhere around 5 hours in KSP, and I already like it a lot. Like, more than friends. In the short time I've played the game, I've managed to blow up a lot of ships and get Valentina stuck in orbit without a Command Module to protect her.

I'm excited to play more, and join this awesome community!

#savevalentina

No hurry, KaijuFace. Kerbals enjoy being stranded, even up to years at a time. :)

Welcome to the forum.

Hello KaijuFace, and welcome to the forum!

Rescuing stranded Kerbals is a rite of passage. For some it's even our raison d'etre.

Happy landings!

Sounds like you've started the way most of us carry on, you've got the hang of it quickly.
The big secret is :- every properly planned mission always works perfectly. If something doesn't work, then obviously you're still in the planning stage and any mistakes/crashes/deaths don't count.

Thanks for the warm welcome!

I feel like I'll fit in, here.
I also end up with kerbals stuck in orbit. I've rescued a few, but can't really seem to get the hang of zipping around outside of a craft.
